title: PC Auto Shutdown v6.2 Key + Keygen [4realtorrentz]
description:
PC Auto Shutdown v6.2 Key + Keygen [4realtorrentz]

PC Auto Shutdown is a handy software that helps you automatically
shutdown, power off, reboot, hibernate, suspend or log off
computers at schedule time you specifies. It can shut down
computers at schedule time when no user is logged in or when
computers are in suspended power conservation mode. It gives you
different ways to schedule the shutdown event for your needs, such
as daily, weekly and only once. During the shutdown, it can clean
up Recycle Bin, temporary files, IE cache, IE cookies, IE history,
IE auto- complete entries and recent document list to improve
system performance and protect your privacy.

Summary:

- A guided schedule creation process
The user interface of the program consists of a wizard, where you can organize several timers. In the first part you set up one or multiple timers - add a timer title, select shutdown actions, time (in hours and minutes), and activate it once, daily, on week days, or once a week, but you can also edit or delete these tasks.

- Manage time settings and keep them secured
In the following step, the program requires you to configure the countdown duration time before a shutdown event is activated, enable / disable the display of the system tray icon for easy access, as well as the Abort button in countdown window, and prevent users from changing the system time.

- Clever integration of hotkey support
Additionally, you can assign hotkeys to shutdown actions (power off, shutdown, reboot, hibernate, suspend, log off), but also enable and select sound to play while the shutdown command is activated (loop sound, adjust volume).

- Cleans your computer before triggering a command
Furthermore, you can clean up some items during the shutdown action - Recycle Bin, Windows temporary files, Internet Explorer (temporary files, cookies, browser history, address bar history) and recent documents list, as well as enable password protection and the logging of shutdown events (view/empty log file).

- As a conclusion
All in all, the program uses a small amount of system resources, but it doesn't come with a help file or more advanced settings. Nevertheless, it is a decent application for scheduling the shutdown operation on your computer, saving you a decent amount of time.

What's new in PC Auto Shutdown 6.0:

- Support Windows 10

Instructions:

1. Unpack and install
2. Use given details to register
3. Done
